label: Consume and Transform Data by Using Microsoft Excel (30-35%)

skills.label: Import from data sources
items: Connect to and import from databases, files, and folders
Connect to microsoft sql azure, big data, sql server analysis services (ssas), and power query
Link to data from other sources

skills.label: Perform data transformations
items: Design and implement basic and advanced transformations, apply business rules, change data format to support visualization, filter data, format data

skills.label: Cleanse data
items: Handle data received as a report
Remove unnecessary rows, columns, and data

skills.label: Create and optimize data models
items: Manage data relationships, optimize models for reporting, manually enter data, perform get & transform, create automatic relationships, create manual relationships

skills.label: Create calculated columns, measures, and tables
items: Create dax queries, create dax formulas, create excel formulas

skills.label: Create performance KPIs
items: Calculate the actual value, calculate the target value, calculate actual to target values

skills.label: Create hierarchies
items: Create date hierarchies, create business hierarchies, resolve hierarchy issues

skills.label: Create and manage PivotTables
items: Format pivottables and pivotcharts, format calculated measures, filter data, group and summarize data

skills.label: Create and manage PivotCharts
items: Select a chart type, format calculated measures, filter data
Group and summarize data, use slicers

skills.label: Interact with Power BI
items: Import excel data from power bi, manipulate excel data in power bi
